name: taobao.bus.tvmcreateqrcode.set
apiChineseName: 自助机生成支付宝支付二维码
description: 用于汽车票线下自助机调用获取支付宝的二维码

responseParams.name: result_code
responseParams.description: errorCode      错误码 及其 描述 ("PAYED_OR_CANCEL_FAIL_NOT_CREATE_QRCODE", "已支付/取消/失败订单不能创建二维码"),     ("PAYED_OR_CANCEL_FAIL_NOT_CREATE_SCAN_CODE", "已支付/取消/失败订单不能创建条形码"),     ("CREATE_QRCODE_ERROR", "创建二维码失败"),     ("DISABLE_QRCODE_ERROR", "失效二维码失败"),     ("CREATE_SCANCODE_ERROR", "扫码失败"),     ("CREATE_SCANCODE_PROCESSING", "扫码处理中")

responseParams.name: result_msg
responseParams.description: errorMsg     错误码 及其 描述 ("PAYED_OR_CANCEL_FAIL_NOT_CREATE_QRCODE", "已支付/取消/失败订单不能创建二维码"),     ("PAYED_OR_CANCEL_FAIL_NOT_CREATE_SCAN_CODE", "已支付/取消/失败订单不能创建条形码"),     ("CREATE_QRCODE_ERROR", "创建二维码失败"),     ("DISABLE_QRCODE_ERROR", "失效二维码失败"),     ("CREATE_SCANCODE_ERROR", "扫码失败"),     ("CREATE_SCANCODE_PROCESSING", "扫码处理中")

responseParams.name: is_success
responseParams.description: success true 成功 false 失败
